actions.title: [Eventually Consistent] maryjanesmiles commented on Grout Master in Portland, Oregon
actions.summary: Commenter maryjanesmiles commented on Grout Master in Portland, Oregon.

comment.comment: Grout Master Mike is a sweet heart!  He might look a little ruff but he truly knows his stuff and how to treat a customer.  I have had trouble almost my entire life dealing with construction people and this was a pleasant experience to say the least.They showed up on time, explained things to me and what options I had and they were so nice!  My husband of 45 years passed away last fall and I haven’t had to deal too much with contractors until recently.  Being treated like I hadn’t lost my marbles was a nice treat to say the least!  Just because I’m old doesn’t make me senile.  It was a great treat to be treated with both respect and courtesy.

comment.comment: @fharper J'ai souvent commandé de la pizza là-bas et c'est toujours bon. Par contre, je n'ai jamais mangé sur place ou gouté aux desserts.

actions.title: [praized.com hub] fharper commented on Restaurant Pizzeria Sandhu in Montreal, Quebec
actions.summary: Commenter fharper commented on Restaurant Pizzeria Sandhu in Montreal, Quebec.

comment.comment: La nourriture et l'ambiance étaient correctes, mais le dessert totalement affreux.De plus, j'ai choisi un vin listé comme importation privée qui ne s'avérait pas l'être.
